54 121 336 450 493 484 479 467 443 4 1 1 1 1 1 1 13 17 53 120 335 449 492 484 479 467 443 1 1 1 1 17 18 54 121 336 450 493 485 480 468 444 6 2 6 2 10 9 16 11 432 358 100 56 2228 2227 33 33 33 33 3333333 8 25 8 25 31 31 20 29 28 29 28 33886 28 28 53 332 25 16 32~ 346 426 668 4226 939 1,270 1,621 1,621 1,862 12 93 105 188 380 56 22 9 9 3 3 3 1 1 1 1 15 15 176 203 263 307 341 421 653 811 1,005 1,201 1,215 34 159 231 266 85 62 4 4 4 432 358 297 332 346 426 668 943 1,274 1,625 4 1,866 223 71 37 106 68 97 106 121 131 19 19 17 17 11 21 35 18 2220 2220 83 152 20 3 35533 171 56 79 36 17 18 89 51 86 85 83 87 60 73 56 14 2 1 1 13 24 55 60 60 22 85 39 107 69 110 130 176 191 143 152 193 903 873 1,211 1,420 1,841 2,069 2,452 2,827 3,310 4,152 4,618   ## p. 624 (#648) ############################################  Appendix 9 (continued) Aircraft in the European Theater of Operations June 1942 to August 1945 1944 Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Combat Airplanes 1st Line 5,035 5,952 7,035 7,700 7,834 7,505 8,423 8,605 8,735 2nd Line 98 93 136 175 517 460 473 609 637 Total 5,133 6,045 7,171 7,875 8,351 7,965 8,896 9,214 9,372 Heavy Bombers 1st Line 1,774 1,965 2,259 2,562 2,937 2,929 3,304 3,435 3,398 B-17 1,341 1,412 1,487 1,492 1,502 1,471 1,695 1,829 1,927 B-24 433 553 772 1,070 1,435 1,458 1,609 1,606 1,471 2nd Line 43 33 36 85 200 171 188 227 261 Total 1,817 1,998 2,295 2,647 3,137 3,100 3,492 3,662 3,659 Medium Bombers 1st Line B-25 B-26 2nd Line Total Light Bombers 1st Line 506 670 837 866 788 804 853 850 843 'ཙྩཀྑུ 506 670 837 866 788 804 853 850 843 1 1 12 58 41 39 65 33 507 671 838 878 846 845 892 915 876 40 A-20 40 1221 289 331 385 387 430 436 508 289 331 385 387 430 419 440 A-26 17 68 2nd Line 29 37 35 35 40 39 43 46 44 Total 69 158 324 366 425 426 473 482 552 Fighters 1st Line 2,528 2,998 3,419 3,685 3,382 3,046 3,480 3,470 3,470 P-38 637 669 707 750 673 568 584 477 379 P-39 P-40 P-47 1,348 P-51 543 1,630 699 1,920 792 1,985 950 1,870 1,632 1,706 1,768 1,840 819 803 1
